alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 6:57PM CDT until September 19 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Knox County in northern Texas... Southwestern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Benjamin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Munday, Benjamin, Goree, Red Springs, Vera, Rhineland, and Bomarton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
